text: Bob Tucker (April 1, 1943 – March 5, 2017) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at the College of Wooster from 1985 to 1994, compiling a record of 29–66–1. ==Head coaching record== ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Iowa State Cyclones football coaches Category:Ohio State Buckeyes football coaches Category:Penn State Nittany Lions football coaches Category:Wooster Fighting Scots football coaches Category:Youngstown State Penguins football coaches
title: Bob Tucker (coach)
